channel.title: ::Pickup restrictions
channel.description: How can I make it that if someone tries to spawn a certain item... lets say 744, it gives them a message saying that item is unspawnable, but if they try spawning anything else they can, how?

item.title: ::Pickup restrictions
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

something like :

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

  if (newItemID == 456){ // ID that cant get picked up
            sendMessage("You cant pickup that item");
    } else if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { 	
            addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
    } else {
            sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
    }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
